description: Spain says new coronavirus cases are isolated, as the UK tells arriving passengers to self-isolate.
title: Coronavirus: Spain says outbreaks under control after UK orders quarantine
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain says outbreaks under control after UK orders quarantine - BBC News
maintext: "We know what British tourism means for our country, and particularly for our region," said the vice-president of Andalusia, Juan Mar¨ªn. He described it as "very bad news" particularly for the Costa del Sol, where many British tourists tend to spend their holidays.
